alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 8:01AM MST until January 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow will continue today above 5000 feet, becoming more showery by this afternoon. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Eagar- Springerville, Ganado, Pinetop-Lakeside, Saint Johns, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 7 AM Today to 6 PM Today: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 0 to 1 inches Ganado 1 to 3 inches Pinetop-Lkside 1 to 2 inches Saint Johns 0 to 1 inches Show Low 1 to 2 inches Whiteriver 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
